page.title: 14FECKENHAM NEWCOMERS 2
page.content:
WHY WE MOVED TO FECKENHAM-A NEWCOMER
We moved to Feckenham because of my husband's work. We wanted a bungalow with a big garden. We were attracted to Feckenham as it was a proper village with a proper village community. I am very involved with the church and I like the active Sunday school for my children. I like the idea of a village school but it is a mile from my front door to the school. The village shop is important and should be supported. We were a bit worried that outsiders would not be welcome, but the neighbours called within an hour with a bag of tomatoes. We like it in the village and feel that the countryside makes up for the lack of amenities.
